entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.4°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
